name: Tsus, Dragonblood's Heir
text:
Vigilance
Whenever a creature you control attacks, Tsus, Dragonblood's Heir deals 1 damage to the player or planeswalker it’s attacking.
Whenever Tsus, Dragonblood's Heir attacks, if defending player's life total is less than half its starting life total, you may transform Tsus, Dragonblood's Heir.
